wcs.java

Class Env

  • java.lang.Object
    • ICSProxyJ
      • wcs.java.Env
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestEnv

    public class Env
extends ICSProxyJ
    Facade to the Sites services. It is passed as the main argument to element logic.

    • Constructor Summary

      Build the env from the ICS
